mapper.insert: insert into buyticket (user_id, scenic_id, count) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scenicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select user_id, scenic_id, create_time, count, update_time from buyticket
select bt.* from buyticket bt where bt.user_id=#{userId} and bt.scenic_id=#{scenicId} order by create_time desc
